title: Strategy Refinements from Becker Dataset Analysis

overview.summary: Pivot from TAKER to MAKER strategy based on 404M trade analysis
overview.keyInsight: Takers systematically lose to makers at all price levels. Longshot bias creates 1.5-2% seller edge on sub-15% contracts.
overview.recommendation: Post limit SELL orders on BTC longshot YES tokens instead of crossing spreads

longshotVolumeAnalysis.interpretation: Retail takers are net SELLERS of longshots - they're taking profits/cutting losses on cheap options
